info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: travail-emploi.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4242
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 4242
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:laval.jouve-hdi.com -all"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21956
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 21956
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 7, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns4.perf1.de.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns1.perf1.com.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns3.perf1.eu.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	b.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	a.ns.developpement-durable.gouv.fr.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns5.perf1.asia.
travail-emploi.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns2.perf1.fr.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 15064
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:

response:
